src:
Chelsea Seriusi Perburuan Moussa Dembele
04 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United mendapatkan pesaing berat untuk merekrut Moussa Dembele. Striker Lyon itu juga diberitakan bakal dikejar juga oleh Chelsea.
Dembele menjadi salah satu penyerang mematikan di Prancis. Dalam waktu singkat, ia menjadi andalan Lyon di ujung tombak mereka dengan ketajamannya di area kotak penalti.
Performa apik striker 22 tahun itu diberitakan menarik perhatian Manchester United. Tim berjuluk Setan Merah itu tertarik untuk memboyongnya di bulan Januari nanti.
Namun The Daily Mail mengklaim United memiliki pesaing berat untuk merekrut Dembele. Chelsea diberitakan bakal bersaing dengan United untuk mendapatkan jasa sang striker.

Mengapa Chelsea tertarik merekrut Dembele? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Chelsea are serious about the hunt for Moussa Dembele
Nov 04 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United get a tough competitor to recruit Moussa Dembele. Lyon striker was also reported to be chased by Chelsea too.
Dembele became one of the deadliest attackers in France. In a short time, he became a mainstay of Lyon on the edge of their spear with his sharpness in the area of the penalty box.
The 22-year-old striker's excellent performance was reportedly attracted Manchester United's attention. The team nicknamed the Red Devils are interested in bringing him next January.
But The Daily Mail claims United have a tough competitor to recruit Dembele. Chelsea reportedly will compete with United to get the services of the striker.

Why is Chelsea interested in recruiting Dembele? Check out the information below.
